data_snapshot.price_action: Gold shows strong bullish breakout with close above all EMAs and BB upper band, high volume (353K), and significant range (118 pts). SPX also bullish but with weaker momentum. DXY and VIX show consolidation patterns.
data_snapshot.momentum: XAUUSD: RSI 70.3 (overbought), MACD bullish (79.44 > SIG 70.85), ADX 28.1 (moderate trend strength). SPX: RSI 63.08, weaker momentum. VIX and DXY show weak or bearish momentum signals.
data_snapshot.volatility: Gold: HIGH volatility regime (VOL_PCT 86.07%, PARK_VOL 0.0132). SPX: LOW volatility (VOL_PCT 13.1%). VIX and DXY also in low volatility regimes.
data_snapshot.cross_assets: Gold breakout occurring alongside SPX strength (RISK_ON environment), DXY consolidation (98.65), and low VIX (16.08) suggesting low fear. Positive correlation with risk assets.

analysis.trend: Strong bullish trend for gold with confirmation from multiple technical indicators and cross-asset alignment
key_drivers: EMA bull stack across all timeframes
analysis.reasoning: Gold demonstrates a clear technical breakout with close above all key resistance levels, strong momentum indicators (RSI OB but MACD bullish), high volatility regime, and supportive cross-asset context with SPX strength and low VIX. The combination of technical breakout signals and risk-on market environment confirms BREAKOUT regime.
risk_factors: RSI overbought at 70.3 may suggest near-term pullback risk
High volatility regime increases price swing risk
MACD histogram positive but could signal momentum peak
DXY consolidation could turn supportive for USD if breaks higher
